properties.areaDesc: Pamlico and Pungo Rivers; Neuse and Bay Rivers
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued February 5 at 3:19PM EST until February 7 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 kt with gusts up to 40 kt and
very rough waters expected.

* WHERE...Pamlico, Pungo, Neuse, and Bay Rivers.

* WHEN...From 9 PM Thursday to 4 PM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THURSDAY TO 4 PM EST FRIDAY
